description:
Kishi Touka is a sixteen years old high school student who is http://anidb.net/ch3394 [Kyousuke]`s little sister. She is also an employee of Hiizumi Life Counseling office. Just like her brother, she is an Oni with superhuman strength. She has a crush on http://anidb.net/ch3391 [Akina], which Kyousuke is not pleased with.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kishi Touka
